snippet: The city is trying to prevent the Department of Justice from seizing property leased to Harborside Health Center, the largest medical marijuana dispensary in the country.
abstract: Oakland, Calif, files lawsuit in federal court to prevent Department of Justice from seizing property leased to largest medical marijuana dispensary in country; it is first city to file such a suit amid escalated efforts by federal prosecutors to close state dispensaries.
lead_paragraph: The city is trying to prevent the Department of Justice from seizing property leased to Harborside Health Center, the largest medical marijuana dispensary in the country.

headline.seo: Oakland Sues to Prevent Closing of Medical Marijuana Dispensary
headline.main: Oakland Sues U.S. to Prevent Closing of Marijuana Dispensary
headline.print_headline: Oakland Files Suit Against U.S. to Prevent Closing of Marijuana Dispensary
